thread.title: Facebook takes aim at Google and makes 2 TRILLION public posts searchable
thread.title_full: Facebook takes aim at Google and makes 2 TRILLION public posts searchable

title: Facebook takes aim at Google and makes 2 TRILLION public posts searchable
text:
Facebook takes aim at Google and makes 2 TRILLION public posts searchable 
Daily Mail Friday 23rd October, 2015 
The Verge ? 'The whole idea here is that if you can group these pieces of content in certain ways, it makes it pretty easy to get the full story.''Search is an important, long-term effort at Facebook,' it site said in a post announcing the new feature
